links.to_node: refuse to take care of the dog unless my sister steps up and takes responsibility.
My refusal to help may increase the burden on my mother and younger sister.
The dog's care may continue to be neglected, leading to potential health and behavioral issues for the dog.
My relationship with my older sister may become more strained due to my stance.
My mother and younger sister may experience increased stress and frustration due to the added responsibilities and living conditions.
The living conditions in the apartment may deteriorate further without my occasional assistance.
I may experience guilt or distress from seeing the dog's continued neglect and the impact on my family.
